name: RO Idle
description:
Game is under development and in alpha phase.

Play RO Idle. Fan made MMO browser game based on 20 year old original Ragnarok game with elements of D&D added to it. You need to level up your character, get stronger with unique stats and skill builds. Find friends and join party with them to fight and level up together. You will need to cooperate with healers to not die.

Game emphasize player driven economy. You can only get starting gear from NPC shops. The rest can only be bought from other Merchant players or if you up for it, by leveling merchant yourself and opening your own shop and selling your crafted stuff by operating your own unique shop.

Grinding progress is using idle mechanics, so you don't need to be online and actively hit monsters to level up. Character do it for you. You must concentrate on more interesting part - interaction with other users to survive and get strongest in this world or richest by opening line of shops in every possible habitat city.
